game.name: Space Galaxcolory
game.description:
Adventure games are a wonderful platform to enjoy and kill your time. Today we have got you covered with a brand new adventure challenge where you have to control a spaceship. Are you ready to take on this unique kind of challenge? Join Space Galaxcolory and get ready to defend your ship against the approaching enemies! When you click the play button, you will enter a space area full of deadly enemies. Destroy all of them to clear all the stages while protecting your planet!
There are multiple galaxies to explore and enjoy in this html5 flying game. Keep your spaceship at a safe place and start releasing bullets at your enemies! You have accepted a challenge to clear the area from all the deadly enemies. Prepare yourself for the dangerous battle of your life and get ready to wear the one of one who has the ability to save your world! Your viable shooting abilities will help you to move from one galaxy to another. 
Do not forget to grab all the bonuses coming on your way to upgrade your spaceship against a group of deadly enemies. It is a wonderful chance to become the best pilot of the galaxy world. Grab your weapons to prove yourself among numerous other galaxies in this cool space game! Use WASD to move your character and mouse to shoot your enemy ships! Defeat all the enemies to become a champion of the galactic war! Check out more arcade games for boys and girls and have fun for free online on atmegame.com, no download required!
